website_summaries.verdict: Offers durable craftsmanship and produces a good quality, consistent outcome.
pros: A lightweight but sturdy bender made from die-cast aluminum
Wide foot pedal provides excellent stability
Stamped markings are easy to read
Makes high quality and consistent bends
cons: Some reports of bubbles in the castings, which can cause this option to break
Does not come with detailed directions, but you can find these online

customer_reviews.title: Great Bender For Me
customer_reviews.text: The lighter head is fine for me as I am only bending EMT. This bender works smoothly and the markings are accurate, making offsets and bends other than 90 degrees repeatable. Nice tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Dill

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: the casted material broke upon the first time i used this tool to bend a 1/2 conduit.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price i got it so cheap on here now its way more now, love it to
customer_reviews.author: dustin cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just like the "Benfield" foot bender
customer_reviews.text: Just like the "Benfield" foot bender. Once you use it, your hooked because of the nice bend that it gives you. I have been using foot benders for the last 40 years + and once you get a feel for the quality of this product, nothing feels the same and if someone borrows it and replaces it with another, you know someone's looking for trouble. Its a great product you will be proud of.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the man

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well worth the money. Easily bends the conduit, and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Emileigh R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent EMT Bender Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent EMT bender. Very well made, with precision casting.. Handles well and is not overly heavy, which makes bending conduit easier. Made in the USA which is a definite plus and which is a factor that contributes to its quality of construction.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Klein is top quality
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get and Klein is top quality. You do pay for it. It's not cheap. For that I give it four stars instead of five. It seems nowadays you're stuck with cheap junk that is affordable or very good stuff that is sky high in price.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Grider

customer_reviews.title: Great bender
customer_reviews.text: As far as benders go this works great. You might have issues with kinks in your pipe if your company buys the cheaper conduit.
customer_reviews.author: Tinysparky

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good price.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Good product at a good price. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my budding electrician grandson and he's happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Good Build Quality, Effective Tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 3/4" EMT conduit bending needs. Casting is good and the pipe handle is stout
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Good tool poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Instructions including the web site did not provide adequate instructions on how to use. Once the proper use is understood the bender makes accurate repeatable bends. I would buy again or recommend to others. There are good YouTube videos that explain the correct use of the bender,
customer_reviews.author: TerryD

customer_reviews.title: Decent  if you dont mind waisting material.
customer_reviews.text: This bender for the price is good. Only problem I'm having is that it kinks the pipe. This becomes a problem when you have to rebend pipe and waist it. Its material that you have to rebuy if it continues . I did not have this issue with other brands .
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: If you need a bender. Get this one
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It’s a conduit bender, and it bends conduit accurately. A good buy
customer_reviews.author: Cory c

customer_reviews.title: Kinks pipe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second head I have bought. If you start a bend in the air then finish it in the floor it kinks the 90s
customer_reviews.author: Spiocola

customer_reviews.title: To have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Don't know that we have used it. But it is one of those things that when you need it, you need it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Unit^Instruction Guide
customer_reviews.text: The product description clearly sates "Included Components Unit^Instruction Guide" -I did not receive.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: good price, item as described
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery,good price,item as described,should have been packaged better-box was open on 1 end when I received,but luckily had no damage.need to use more tape next time
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: I like the Klein bender the best because it maintains a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use benders almost daily and I have the choice of many different brands. I like the Klein bender the best because it maintains a accurate bend.
customer_reviews.author: Brad r

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent tool. Should last a long time with proper use.
customer_reviews.author: JeffersonOh

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money on this tool. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a conduit bender to build a frame for my boat cover, requiring precise bends. I was tempted to buy the less expensive tool, but am very glad that I spend the few extra dollars. This is a solid professional grade tool that makes easy work of precision bending.
customer_reviews.author: poly

customer_reviews.title: A great tool
customer_reviews.text: Klein tools cost a bit more, but they do the job. This bender, with the aluminum handle, was reasonable and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Handy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Excellent Quality. Cheap and best. Easy to use. Easy for any Layman too. This was simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. CHITKARA

customer_reviews.title: Great bender I would say it ranks right up there ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bender I would say it ranks right up there with a ideal bender it's very accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Morningstar

customer_reviews.title: I hate these things
customer_reviews.text: Gads! I hate these things, but, this one works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hoteldoc

customer_reviews.title: High quality American made
customer_reviews.text: High quality American made bender seems to be prefect so far very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: you will get to like this and nothing can ever replace the feel of ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used similar type benders and in time you get the feel for your own. Have no fear, you will get to like this and nothing can ever replace the feel of quality. Have been doing electrical work since 1972 and I have known junk and I have known quality. This is quality and you won't be mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tool. I find the measurement of the angles to be very accurate. Klein is an excellent name.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M., San Diego, CA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cheap bender it kinks anything you try to bend
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Paus

customer_reviews.title: The Klein benders are off on their degrees.
customer_reviews.text: The Klein benders are off on their degrees. I've had multiple people try them out from journeymen to project managers and all say the degrees are off and have to readjust to get the right offset
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Excellent Quality. Cheap and best. Easy to use. Easy for any Layman too. I used it and was easy.
customer_reviews.author: J. CHITKARA

customer_reviews.title: I was rather disappointed by something so easy to fix
customer_reviews.text: Klein Tools really failed on the packaging on this item, it arrived damaged and I ended up having to just buy one from Menards, I was rather disappointed by something so easy to fix, guess the cost cutting is getting in the way of a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: very good bender
customer_reviews.text: for this price and made in USA, this item not just looks nice also very handy, very light weight very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Conduit Bender for 1/2-Inch EMT Conduit with Benfield Head, Wide Foot Pedal, Benchmark Symbols Klein Tools 56206
product_meta.description: Size:1/2-Inch EMTPerform accurate conduit bends such as Stub Ups, Offsets, Back-to-Backs and Saddles repeatedly with this aluminum conduit bender. The wide foot pedal provides excellent stability and features angled grooves for extra traction. The bold cast-in benchmark symbols, degree scales and multiplier scales help save time on the job. Die-cast aluminum bender reduces rippling and ovaling of conduit. 1/2-Inch bender has interior clamp and hook for safety. Lightweight die-cast aluminum construction. Easily visible arrow for alignment on conduit marks. Interior clamp securely holds conduit while cutting with hacksaw. Interior hook surface prevents conduit from rolling or twisting during bends. Has markings for 10 degrees, 22.5 degrees, 30 degrees, 45 degrees, and 60 degrees. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.
feature_bullets: The traditional Benfield head design accurately and consistently performs common bends such as Stub Ups, Offsets, Back-to-Back and Saddle bends
Exclusive design reduces rippling and ovaling of conduit
Wide foot pedal provides excellent stability, leverage and comfort
Bold cast-in benchmark symbols, degree scales and multiplier scales help save time on the job

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars220 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
